title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Justice) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister justice) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Mr Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Mr Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Justice, 51 St. Stephen’s Green, Dublin 2, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Justice with effect from 13 
July 2020, And, Mr Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been 
deposited at the offices of the Department of Justice, 51 St. Stephen’s Green, 
Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Justice with 
effect from 20 July 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [679] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR

FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
